title: The Deed
description: When a couple in rural South Carolina is brutally murdered in their home, the investigation into who committed this heinous act tears a family apart. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 4, 2016.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
